channel.title: New rsps -- wolfscape 718
channel.description:
Website: http://wolfservers.net/home.php Forums: http://wolfservers.net/forum Play Now: http://wolfservers.net/client Vote: http://wolfservers.net/vote] Donate: http://wolfservers.net/donate] HighScores: http://wolfservers.net/highscores
R-S Mod Response Community Statement:WolfScape, the server will be online 24/7 with always something for you to do. The servers growth and development is based off of user input and ideas. If you want to see the server grow bigger then help out and advertise. If you want more features give input to a developer and they can make the server more fun for you.
Online Time: WolfScape is 24/7 online guaranteed. Our server is hosted off of a off-shore 2gb ram dedicated server with 3 different ips.
About us:WolfScape is a server made based on user friendliness and helping users fix any problems.WolfScape bring's all of the possible ways our staff can assist you with any of your problems or issues when regarding this server. In order to maintain the great environment we please ask that you do not abuse any of our help systems. WolfScape is a economy/Pk'ing based server. We offer a variety of different minigames, skills, bosses and different events to help bring a stable economy and create the best gaming for our users. If there is ever a time you get an idea that you think would help better the server please give us your input. Update's Info:WolfScape will have many updates in order to create an ideal community. Every month the staff strives for at least 2 major updates made. Also whenever a bug/glitch is reported we will patch it as soon as we can.
Features Working MoneyPouch! dupe in the MoneyPouch patched Summoning Orb With Draining Fixed Cheat Egine Dupe! custom items with 711 model header [Server Announcement when you get 99 LevelPoints with a Store custom GFX and Anime for some basic commands Lottery, [Lottie] Donators need Donor points to use their Shops not cash[Makes it so reg players cant be teled there and buy the items] Vote4Cash Voting System with SOF Spins on claim Smithing (x5, x10) 120 Dungeoneering Comp Cape requireing all 99s. New Superdonator Extreme Donator Rank Better Duel Arena New ::Help method Better Prayer Better Eco Vote point shop Tokkul Shop 2b Ticket Exchange New member rank timedmute timedban SollyStore Nice Player ritles With a good Interface Player Titles for most ranks Player Cliping Summoning Working Fixed Charms Better Spirit Shields (Not showing lines like regualr ones) Staff Tab saying if staff is online or not. Most Sinlge and Double doors working the way they need to Awesome Donator Benifits Made a lot of things Fixed Freezing in Wise old man New staff capes AND MUCH, MUCH, MUCH MORE!

item.title: New rsps -- wolfscape 718
item.dc:creator: @RampageHDiego RampageHDiego
item.description:
@RampageHDiego wrote:

Website: http://wolfservers.net/home.php
Forums: http://wolfservers.net/forum
Play Now: http://wolfservers.net/client
Vote: http://wolfservers.net/vote]
Donate: http://wolfservers.net/donate]
HighScores: http://wolfservers.net/highscores

R-S Mod Response Community Statement:WolfScape, the server will be online 24/7 with always something for you to do. The servers growth and development is based off of user input and ideas. If you want to see the server grow bigger then help out and advertise. If you want more features give input to a developer and they can make the server more fun for you.

Online Time: WolfScape is 24/7 online guaranteed. Our server is hosted off of a off-shore 2gb ram dedicated server with 3 different ips.

About us:WolfScape is a server made based on user friendliness and helping users fix any problems.WolfScape bring’s all of the possible ways our staff can assist you with any of your problems or issues when regarding this server. In order to maintain the great environment we please ask that you do not abuse any of our help systems.
WolfScape is a economy/Pk’ing based server. We offer a variety of different minigames, skills, bosses and different events to help bring a stable economy and create the best gaming for our users. If there is ever a time you get an idea that you think would help better the server please give us your input.
Update’s Info:WolfScape will have many updates in order to create an ideal community. Every month the staff strives for at least 2 major updates made. Also whenever a bug/glitch is reported we will patch it as soon as we can.

Features
Working MoneyPouch!
dupe in the MoneyPouch patched
Summoning Orb With Draining
Fixed Cheat Egine Dupe!
custom items with 711 model header
[Server
Announcement when you get 99
LevelPoints with a Store
custom GFX and Anime for some basic commands
Lottery, [Lottie]
Donators need Donor points to use their Shops not cash[Makes it so reg players cant be teled there and buy the items]
Vote4Cash Voting System with SOF Spins on claim
Smithing (x5, x10)
120 Dungeoneering
Comp Cape requireing all 99s.
New Superdonator Extreme Donator Rank
Better Duel Arena
New ::Help method
Better Prayer
Better Eco
Vote point shop
Tokkul Shop
2b Ticket Exchange
New member rank
timedmute
timedban
SollyStore
Nice Player ritles With a good Interface
Player Titles for most ranks
Player Cliping
Summoning Working
Fixed Charms
Better Spirit Shields (Not showing lines like regualr ones)
Staff Tab saying if staff is online or not.
Most Sinlge and Double doors working the way they need to
Awesome Donator Benifits
Made a lot of things
Fixed Freezing in Wise old man
New staff capes
AND MUCH, MUCH, MUCH MORE!

Read full topic
